video.title: That '70s Show
video.synopsis: Feel groovy in 1970s suburbia, where a teen and his pals hang in the basement, listening to rock and indulging other hazy benefits of '70s culture.

episodes.synopsis: Eric gets a car, and the gang heads for the big concert.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: The gang plans a surprise party for Eric, and Donna has the perfect gift.
episodes.title: Eric's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: With the President in town, the gang plans a huge prank.
episodes.title: Streaking

episodes.synopsis: Donna beats Eric at one-on-one basketball. Is their courtship over?
episodes.title: Battle of the Sexists

episodes.synopsis: Donna's parents are away. Will she and Eric play?
episodes.title: Eric's Burger Job

episodes.synopsis: An empty house and a keg of beer equals the party of the year!
episodes.title: The Keg

episodes.synopsis: Things heat up when the gang heads to the disco!
episodes.title: That Disco Episode

episodes.synopsis: Four's a crowd when Eric and Donna go to the drive-in with Kelso and Jackie.
episodes.title: Drive-In

episodes.synopsis: Laurie brings home her sexy friend, who comes on to Eric.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Grandma Forman's visit has everyone freaking out.
episodes.title: Sunday, Bloody Sunday

episodes.synopsis: Eric's new best friend has a shocking secret.
episodes.title: Eric's Buddy

episodes.synopsis: The gang throws an "alternative" holiday party.
episodes.title: The Best Christmas Ever

episodes.synopsis: The gang goes skiing, but Kelso's left out in the cold.
episodes.title: Ski Trip

episodes.synopsis: Busted! What are the guys doing behind bars?
episodes.title: Stolen Car

episodes.synopsis: Get ready to rumble! The guys go to a wrestling match.
episodes.title: That Wrestling Show

episodes.synopsis: Eric and Donna go on their first date ... with Hyde.
episodes.title: First Date

episodes.synopsis: Donna goes on the pill, and her dad goes ballistic.
episodes.title: The Pill

episodes.synopsis: The gang is in for a shock when they accompany their parents to their jobs on Career Day!
episodes.title: Career Day

episodes.synopsis: The gang pairs off for some unbelievable dates on an unforgettable Prom Night.
episodes.title: Prom Night

episodes.synopsis: Eric uses the Force to win back Donna.
episodes.title: A New Hope

episodes.synopsis: Bedroom shocker! Eric catches his parents "doing it."
episodes.title: Water Tower

episodes.synopsis: A punk chick roars into town and steals Hyde's heart.
episodes.title: Punk Chick

episodes.synopsis: Guilt trip! Did Eric's rage kill his Grandma?
episodes.title: Grandma's Dead

episodes.synopsis: Hyde moves in with Eric. Now Red's seeing red.
episodes.title: Hyde Moves In

episodes.synopsis: Sibling rivalry! Is Hyde Red and Kitty's new No. 1 son?
episodes.title: The Good Son

episodes.synopsis: Hyde bakes "brownies" and Fez hits on Jackie.
episodes.title: Garage Sale

episodes.synopsis: It's Red's last day at the plant; Kelso gets a free van from his uncle.
episodes.title: Red's Last Day

episodes.synopsis: The gang goes clubbing, but Eric's left out in the cold.
episodes.title: The Velvet Rope

episodes.synopsis: Scandal rocks the Forman house.
episodes.title: Laurie and the Professor

episodes.synopsis: Grade school records reveal long-lost secrets.
episodes.title: Halloween

episodes.synopsis: Three's a crowd when Laurie and Jackie vie for Kelso.
episodes.title: Vanstock

episodes.synopsis: Eric is speechless when Donna uses the "L" word.
episodes.title: I Love Cake

episodes.synopsis: Donna sneaks into Eric's room for a late-night visit.
episodes.title: Sleepover

episodes.synopsis: Red is steamed when Eric's suspended for smoking.
episodes.title: Eric Gets Suspended

episodes.synopsis: Donna finds someone she trusts, but it's not Eric.
episodes.title: Red's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Is Kelso fooling around behind Jackie's back?
episodes.title: Laurie Moves Out

episodes.synopsis: Tempers flare when Eric's stash of cash is missing.
episodes.title: Eric's Stash

episodes.synopsis: Oh deer! Red takes the guys hunting.
episodes.title: Hunting

episodes.synopsis: Eric gets a job at Pricemart as a cashier while Red gets one as a supervisor.
episodes.title: Red Gets a Job

episodes.synopsis: Fire! Jackie's dinner plans go up in smoke!
episodes.title: Burning Down the House

episodes.synopsis: A wedding puts Donna in the mood for "doing it."
episodes.title: The First Time

episodes.synopsis: The word is out -- Eric's bad in bed!
episodes.title: Afterglow

episodes.synopsis: Eric goes to a steamy movie with his mom.
episodes.title: Kitty and Eric's Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Eric and Donna have to admit the naked truth.
episodes.title: Parents Find Out

episodes.synopsis: Eric does the one thing Donna can't forgive.
episodes.title: Kiss of Death

episodes.synopsis: Fez and Kelso want Jackie, but she's hot for Hyde!
episodes.title: Kelso's Serenade

episodes.synopsis: Kelso goes ballistic when Jackie dates Fez.
episodes.title: Jackie Moves On

episodes.synopsis: Eric and Laurie decide not to go to church.
episodes.title: Holy Crap!

episodes.synopsis: Red fires one of his crew. Will Eric be next?
episodes.title: Red Fired Up

episodes.synopsis: Catfight! Laurie and Jackie go to war over Kelso.
episodes.title: Cat Fight Club

episodes.synopsis: No butts about it: Donna's yearbook photo is wild!
episodes.title: Moon Over Point Place

episodes.synopsis: Hyde's busted. Eric comes clean. Red is steamed.
episodes.title: Reefer Madness

episodes.synopsis: Red gives Eric, Hyde and Laurie a curfew.
episodes.title: Red Sees Red

episodes.synopsis: Busted! Donna finds Eric's stash of girlie mags.
episodes.title: Hyde's Father

episodes.synopsis: Scream ... with laughter. It's a Hitchcock happening on "That '70s Show."
episodes.title: Too Old to Trick or Treat, Too Young to Die

episodes.synopsis: Jackie's ready for love. Will Fez have the nerve?
episodes.title: Roller Disco

episodes.synopsis: Donna finds mystery panties in Eric's car.
episodes.title: Eric's Panties

episodes.synopsis: A little baby spells big trouble for the Formans.
episodes.title: Baby Fever

episodes.synopsis: Things heat up at the battle of the barbecues.
episodes.title: Jackie Bags Hyde

episodes.synopsis: Hyde's dad gets a lesson in fatherhood from Red.
episodes.title: Hyde's Christmas Rager

episodes.synopsis: Eric and Donna and Kelso and Jackie play a version of "The Newlywed Game," hosted by Fez.
episodes.title: Ice Shack

episodes.synopsis: How long can Eric and Donna stay good?
episodes.title: Who Wants it More?

episodes.synopsis: Donna helps Fez land the girl of his dreams.
episodes.title: Fez Gets the Girl

episodes.synopsis: Fine dining turns into dine and dash!
episodes.title: Dine & Dash

episodes.synopsis: Alice Cooper and Donna! It's Eric's nightmare.
episodes.title: Radio Daze

episodes.synopsis: Fatal attraction! Is Fez's dream girl a nightmare?
episodes.title: Donna's Panties

episodes.synopsis: Red and Kitty ruin Eric's romantic weekend.
episodes.title: Romantic Weekend

episodes.synopsis: The wrath of Kitty! Eric forgets a birthday.
episodes.title: Kitty's Birthday (That's Today?!)

episodes.synopsis: Revenge against a rival school isn't so sweet.
episodes.title: The Trials of M. Kelso

episodes.synopsis: Eric's new bedroom moves are strictly X-rated.
episodes.title: Eric's Naughty No-No

episodes.synopsis: Eric takes a frightening look into his future.
episodes.title: Holy Craps

episodes.synopsis: Will Fez and Donna's fake date become a real thing?
episodes.title: Fez Dates Donna

episodes.synopsis: To win Donna's heart, Eric tattoos his butt.
episodes.title: Eric's Drunken Tattoo

episodes.synopsis: A beer run turns into an international incident.
episodes.title: Canadian Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Donna ditches Eric to hang with Ted Nugent.
episodes.title: Backstage Pass

episodes.synopsis: Is it splitsville for Eric and Donna?
episodes.title: The Promise Ring

episodes.synopsis: It's a "Donna-less Life" when an angel visits Eric.
episodes.title: It's a Wonderful Life

episodes.synopsis: Love hurts! Eric and Donna adjust to being single.
episodes.title: Eric's Depression

episodes.synopsis: Gang war! Eric and Donna fight over their friends.
episodes.title: Pinciotti vs. Forman

episodes.synopsis: Matchmaker Fez finds Hyde his dream girl.
episodes.title: Hyde Gets the Girl

episodes.synopsis: Will Kitty's remodeling wreck Eric's hangout?
episodes.title: Bye-Bye Basement

episodes.synopsis: Kelso takes Fez to the Piggly Wiggly to hit on older women.
episodes.title: The Relapse

episodes.synopsis: Eric meets a new girl while out with Donna.
episodes.title: Uncomfortable Ball Stuff

episodes.synopsis: Donna's tell-all story dishes the dirt on Eric.
episodes.title: Donna's Story

episodes.synopsis: Move over, Travolta, Kelso's a movie star!
episodes.title: The Forgotten Son

episodes.synopsis: Red encourages Eric to ask out a new Pricemart cashier.
episodes.title: Red & Stacey

episodes.synopsis: Will a new girl come between Hyde and Eric?
episodes.title: Third Wheel

episodes.synopsis: It's the wildest holiday show ever!
episodes.title: An Eric Forman Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Someone's been rifling through Eric's stuff.
episodes.title: Jackie Says Cheese

episodes.synopsis: She's hot, she's willing ... and she's Eric's cousin!
episodes.title: Eric's Hot Cousin

episodes.synopsis: A tornado shakes things up at the big dance.
episodes.title: Tornado Prom

episodes.synopsis: Donna dates a Kelso. Luke Wilson guest stars.
episodes.title: Donna Dates a Kelso

episodes.synopsis: Eric's speechless when Red says, "I love you."
episodes.title: Kelso's Career

episodes.synopsis: Brief encounter! Kelso's an underwear model.
episodes.title: Leo Loves Kitty

episodes.synopsis: Red's in love ... with his new Corvette.
episodes.title: Jackie's Cheese Squeeze

episodes.synopsis: In a blast from the past, the gang recalls how they met.
episodes.title: Class Picture

episodes.synopsis: Who'll get the last laugh on Prank Day?
episodes.title: Prank Day

episodes.synopsis: Eric's cruising for a bruising when he swipes Red's Corvette.
episodes.title: Eric's Corvette Caper

episodes.synopsis: Hyde's birthday becomes the party of the year.
episodes.title: Hyde's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Fez rocks the house in a blockbuster musical episode.
episodes.title: That '70s Musical

episodes.synopsis: Eric stalks Donna. It must be love!
episodes.title: Eric's False Alarm

episodes.synopsis: Everyone loves Donna's new guy ... except Eric.
episodes.title: Everybody Loves Casey

episodes.synopsis: Kelso and Jackie get engaged ... see it while it lasts.
episodes.title: Love, Wisconsin Style

episodes.synopsis: Eric goes to California against his parents' wishes to ask Donna to come home, and Kelso meets a California girl who's up for anything -- except sex.
episodes.title: Going to California

episodes.synopsis: When Bob enrolls Donna in Catholic high school and Red takes the Vista Cruiser away from Eric, Eric and Donna think their senior year is ruined.
episodes.title: I Can't Quit You Baby

episodes.synopsis: Kitty shocks Red with the news that she's pregnant, while Kelso is equally shocked by the sight of Hyde and Jackie kissing.
episodes.title: What Is and What Should Never Be

episodes.synopsis: Kitty gets startling news from the doctor, her parents visit from Phoenix, and Kelso and Hyde sort out their differences.
episodes.title: Heartbreaker

episodes.synopsis: Eric and Donna's relationship is strained when she buys him an ugly ring. Fez applies for a job at the DMV and gets help from the finger of fate.
episodes.title: Ramble On

episodes.synopsis: Eric worries that going to separate colleges will sink his relationship with Donna. Jackie frets that she can't get Hyde to be faithful.
episodes.title: Over the Hills and Far Away

episodes.synopsis: Eric shops for a special present for Donna. And Red gives Kitty a present, too -- a puppy to distract her from her wild menopausal mood swings.
episodes.title: Hot Dog

episodes.synopsis: At Thanksgiving dinner, Eric plans to announce his engagement to Donna, but another announcement gets made instead -- one that's not so hot for Eric.
episodes.title: Thank You

episodes.synopsis: When Jackie's dad is sent to prison, she's heartbroken. Kelso can't get over the fact that Hyde and Jackie are together. Fez finds love at the DMV.
episodes.title: Black Dog

episodes.synopsis: Eric takes drastic measures when he learns that everyone in the gang, including Kelso, has higher SAT scores than him.
episodes.title: The Crunge

episodes.synopsis: Kitty throws a dinner party so Fez can introduce Nina to the gang, but the evening turns into a battle of the sexes.
episodes.title: The Girl I Love

episodes.synopsis: The Formans and Donna volunteer to help Jackie move out of her family's ski cabin the same weekend that Hyde, Fez and Kelso planned a party there.
episodes.title: Misty Mountain Hop

episodes.synopsis: Jackie has to deal with her feelings about her old boyfriend's new girlfriend. When Kitty's dad passes away, she confronts her issues with her mother.
episodes.title: Your Time Is Gonna Come

episodes.synopsis: Hyde worries that Jackie has feelings for Kelso. Annette thinks Kelso is attracted to Jackie. Kitty takes to her bed like she did when Elvis died.
episodes.title: Babe I'm Gonna Leave You

episodes.synopsis: Donna and Eric spend the weekend playing house, but Eric resorts to deceit to pull it off. Kitty finds out that Eric's been keeping a secret.
episodes.title: When the Levee Breaks

episodes.synopsis: Disapproving of his son's engagement, Red gives Eric a hard time. Kelso gives Jackie a beautiful sweater. And Fez loses his virginity at last!
episodes.title: Whole Lotta Love

episodes.synopsis: Kitty enters Red and Eric in a father/son competition. Leo leaves town, but not without providing Hyde with something to remember him by.
episodes.title: The Battle of Evermore

episodes.synopsis: Everybody goes to the job fair. The discovery of a gray hair forces Kelso to rethink his image. Eric's job offer from a bank gets sabotaged by Kitty.
episodes.title: Hey, Hey What Can I Do?

episodes.synopsis: When Jackie's friends discover that Jackie's been sleeping in Hyde's basement, they try to find her a place to live. Fez meets Nina's parents.
episodes.title: Bring It on Home

episodes.synopsis: Jackie moves in with Donna and starts driving her insane. Eric has to return Donna's engagement ring. Kelso takes a job at the hotel kitchen.
episodes.title: No Quarter

episodes.synopsis: Nina tells Fez she needs some space. And when the gang says they're bored with just hanging out together every day, Kitty suggests a new friend.
episodes.title: Trampled Under Foot

episodes.synopsis: Fez has a sexy dream about Kelso. Eric gets a job in a dog food factory. Hyde gives Jackie an ultimatum: no more spending time alone with Kelso.
episodes.title: You Shook Me

episodes.synopsis: Kelso discovers that Hyde's cheating on Jackie. Someone from school hears about Fez's Kelso sex dream. Laurie comes back home after a long absence.
episodes.title: Nobody's Fault But Mine

episodes.synopsis: Red tells Eric and Donna they have his blessing. A fall from a tower leads to a truce between Kelso and Hyde. Fez gets busted for a senior prank.
episodes.title: Immigrant Song

episodes.synopsis: The kids go camping but miss graduation. Hyde and Kelso insist that Jackie choose between them. Fez is heartbroken that he has to leave America.
episodes.title: Celebration Day

episodes.synopsis: With Red on the mend, Eric's plans to move out are on hold. Jackie's torn between Hyde and Kelso. Laurie has gone on a honeymoon without Fez.
episodes.title: The Kids Are Alright

episodes.synopsis: Eric enjoys lots of "going away" sex with Donna. Fez wonders if he'll ever have sex again with his new wife. Kelso plays Cupid for Jackie and Hyde.
episodes.title: Join Together

episodes.synopsis: It's Eric's birthday and Donna's last night in Point Place. Hyde warns him that he needs to be cool and let Donna go -- like Bogey in Casablanca.
episodes.title: Magic Bus

episodes.synopsis: Brooke refuses to acknowledge that she and Kelso had sex. Jackie's upset when Hyde says Brooke is attractive. Brooke has a big surprise for Kelso.
episodes.title: The Acid Queen

episodes.synopsis: The INS investigates Fez and Laurie's marriage. Brooke tells Kelso that he's off the hook about the baby, but his friends think he's irresponsible.
episodes.title: I'm Free

episodes.synopsis: Eric competes with Kelso for a waiter's job. Fez and Laurie are about to file for divorce ... until the wedding presents start arriving.
episodes.title: We're Not Gonna Take It

episodes.synopsis: Eric meets a girl at a dance. When they call Donna at the radio station to dedicate a song, she flips. Red dispenses holiday cheer as a mall Santa.
episodes.title: Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Eric sleeps all day and lets Kitty baby him, and Donna's had enough of it. Kelso and Brooke's double date with Hyde and Jackie is a disaster.
episodes.title: I'm a Boy

episodes.synopsis: Jackie becomes a "Big Sister." Eric makes a feeble stab at being a handyman. And police cadet Kelso goes on a ride-along in a squad car.
episodes.title: Young Man Blues

episodes.synopsis: Kelso's in a panic when he thinks he's the stooge of his police academy class. Fez applies for his green card.
episodes.title: A Legal Matter

episodes.synopsis: Donna and Eric check out a wedding spot and total Kelso's van. Jackie gives Hyde's room a woman's touch. And Red gets a strange gift from Bob.
episodes.title: I Can See for Miles

episodes.synopsis: Kelso attempts to fix Fez up with Suzy, a friend from the police academy. Kitty gets defensive when Red is visited by a stress management expert.
episodes.title: Sally Simpson

episodes.synopsis: Eric and Donna freak out when she might be pregnant. Donna is mad when Eric insists that raising kids will be her career. Kelso and Fez "break up."
episodes.title: Won't Get Fooled Again

episodes.synopsis: Donna and Eric go to premarital church counseling and lie about having had sex. Police cadet Kelso gets a flare gun, with disastrous results.
episodes.title: Baby Don't You Do It

episodes.synopsis: Jackie fumes when her mom returns from Mexico -- and even more when she discovers who her mom's dating. Will Kelso leave town for the police academy?
episodes.title: Who Are You

episodes.synopsis: Donna and Jackie want to break up their parents' romance and enlist Fez to help them. Kitty goes crazy when Red's heart monitor beeps around Pamela.
episodes.title: Man with Money

episodes.synopsis: Donna catches Eric in a private moment. She's upset when she discovers what got him so turned on. The police academy makes a new man out of Kelso.
episodes.title: Happy Jack

episodes.synopsis: Donna insists that Eric help her register for their wedding gifts. Eric's miserable, until he follows Red's advice.
episodes.title: Do You Think It's Alright?

episodes.synopsis: A new guy starts hanging out with the gang ... and starts hitting on Donna.  Bob asks Pamela to move in with him.
episodes.title: Substitute

episodes.synopsis: Red and Hyde accidentally see Pamela topless. Donna's upset to learn that Eric secretly dated someone else while they were broken up.
episodes.title: Squeeze Box

episodes.synopsis: Mitch convinces Donna to be his date at his brother's wedding, where he introduces her as his fiancée. Kelso and Brooke attend Kitty's baby class.
Wedding bell blues: Red blows the Formans' wedding present money and Eric accidentally ruins Donna's gown.
episodes.title: Sparks

episodes.synopsis: When Donna rents a trailer for herself and Eric, Eric thinks that staying in Point Place after they're married may be a big mistake.
episodes.title: My Wife

episodes.synopsis: Brooke's mom arrives with news for Kelso. Eric is afraid Donna will regret marrying him. There's a big surprise on the eve of the wedding.
episodes.title: Going Mobile

episodes.synopsis: Midge comes back to Point Place. When Hyde is taken to the hospital, Kitty finds shocking information in his medical records. Can Donna forgive Eric?
episodes.title: The Seeker

episodes.synopsis: Eric and Donna decide to be friends. The gang looks for the missing engagement ring at the water tower, and Eric ends up falling off the tower.
episodes.title: Time Is on My Side

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is surprised to learn that Hyde's father is black. Eric runs home naked when his clothes are stolen. Kelso and Brooke are expecting the baby.
episodes.title: Let's Spend the Night Together

episodes.synopsis: Red purchases a shuttered muffler shop. Eric decides he wants to have some fun at the expense of others and vandalizes a local business.
episodes.title: (I Can't Get No) Satisfaction

episodes.synopsis: Hyde's new dad, W.B., offers Hyde a job at his record store company. Hyde wants to take it but is torn since he just accepted a job with Red.
episodes.title: Beast of Burden

episodes.synopsis: Hyde begins working at W.B.'s office and is stuck doing tedious paperwork. Eric sends a drawing to an art school from an ad he saw in a magazine.
episodes.title: It's Only Rock and Roll

episodes.synopsis: When the gang reminisces about childhood troublemaking, Eric realizes he wasn't there and feels like he missed an important life moment.
episodes.title: Rip This Joint

episodes.synopsis: Kitty leaves the book The Joy of Sex in the garage for Red. Danielle is so taken with Fez's understanding of women that she cancels a date with Kelso.
episodes.title: Mother's Little Helper

episodes.synopsis: Hyde's sister Angie just graduated and is going to work with Hyde at their dad's record store company. Kitty tells Fez that Eric goes to roller disco.
episodes.title: Angie

episodes.synopsis: It's up to Hyde and Angie to furnish and decorate the record store and get it open for business. Eric camps out to get tickets to a Styx concert.
episodes.title: You Can't Always Get What You Want

episodes.synopsis: Hyde finds out that his sister has started dating Kelso. Donna agrees to plug Red's muffler shop and their free calendar giveaway on her radio show.
episodes.title: Surprise, Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Kelso brings a huge bag of toys over. He thinks someone just left it at the police station, but the guys point out that they're for needy kids.
episodes.title: Winter

episodes.synopsis: Donna has to return her wedding shoes but is embarrassed to acknowledge her failed marriage. Jackie poses as Donna. Kelso dates Hyde's sister.
episodes.title: Don't Lie to Me

episodes.synopsis: Red and Kitty go ice fishing. Jackie and Donna take a karate class. Kelso indirectly threatens the president. The guys worry that the Feds are coming.
episodes.title: Can't You Hear Me Knocking

episodes.synopsis: Donna rigs a contest at the radio station. Eric asks Red to the game. Red tells everyone who'll listen that his son got him the tickets.
episodes.title: Street Fighting Man

episodes.synopsis: Donna is upset when the station manager wants her to help promote a live broadcast from Grooves Records by appearing on a billboard wearing a bikini.
episodes.title: It's All Over Now

episodes.synopsis: Angie wants to learn how to "burn" one of the gang. Jackie is going to have her own public-access show. Red gives Eric grief for lacking direction.
episodes.title: On with the Show

episodes.synopsis: Eric hits the road with hopes of becoming a documentary filmmaker. He gets a flat and changes his mind, but still wants to get out of Point Place.
episodes.title: Down the Road Apiece

episodes.synopsis: Red, Kitty, Hyde and Jackie head to the auto show. Red poses for a picture with two hot models. Brooke trusts Kelso to watch their baby, Betsy.
episodes.title: Oh, Baby (We Got a Good Thing Goin')

episodes.synopsis: Kelso announces that he can pick Betsy's godparents, but that it can't be Fez. Eric and Donna are shocked when Kelso asks Hyde and Jackie.
episodes.title: Who's Been Sleeping Here?

episodes.synopsis: Eric worries about his future. He looks into becoming a chiropractor and goes to a seminar with Donna, then uses his new knowledge on her.
episodes.title: Gimme Shelter

episodes.synopsis: Eric's transcript reveals he got an "incomplete" in gym class and must attend a summer P.E. session. The gym teacher is none other than Casey Kelso.
episodes.title: 2120 So. Michigan Ave.

episodes.synopsis: Eric learns Red spent his college money on the muffler shop and now has to figure out a way to pay for his education. He comes up with a solution.
episodes.title: 2000 Light Years from Home

episodes.synopsis: Charlie is in town for a few days hanging with the gang. It turns out that his dad owns a beer warehouse, so that's where they end up hanging out.
episodes.title: Take It or Leave It

episodes.synopsis: As a going-away gift, Donna surprises and delights Eric by dressing as Princess Leia. Kelso ends up driving Jackie to Chicago for her new job.
episodes.title: Short and Curlies

episodes.synopsis: Kelso drops off Jackie in Chicago. Eric prepares to leave for Africa. Jackie calls Eric to tell him goodbye. Red discovers the gang smoking.
episodes.title: Til the Next Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Kitty makes an audio tape for Eric. A stripper named Samantha informs Hyde that they got married in Las Vegas -- which Hyde has no memory of!
episodes.title: Bohemian Rhapsody

episodes.synopsis: Hyde discovers that while he was away, Leo nearly put the record store out of business. Meanwhile, a scorned Jackie gets embarrassingly drunk.
episodes.title: Somebody to Love

episodes.synopsis: Kelso, Fez, Randy and Leo throw Hyde a bachelor party and end up in jail. Donna decides to have a girls' night to counteract the bachelor party.
episodes.title: You're My Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: At Red and Kitty's anniversary party, where Kelso proposes to Jackie, we flash back to two days earlier when Kelso realizes he wants to marry her.
episodes.title: Misfire

episodes.synopsis: With Kelso in Chicago, Jackie moves into his room in Fez's apartment. Fez has a date with crazy Caroline. Samantha teaches Kitty a few stripper moves.
episodes.title: Stone Cold Crazy

episodes.synopsis: The gang thinks Donna is cheating on Eric with Randy. Jackie and Fez find out from Donna that Eric has already broken up with her.
episodes.title: Long Away

episodes.synopsis: The gang come up with the idea to steal Fatso the Clown from Fatso Burger. But the entire town is upset about one of their "landmarks" being stolen.
episodes.title: Fun It

episodes.synopsis: Fez meets Marsha, Kitty's old nemesis. The two start dating and Kitty is mortified. For Donna's birthday, Randy suggests they all go in on a present.
episodes.title: Good Company

episodes.synopsis: Jackie cleans the apartment she shares with Fez but falls asleep with the bath running. Fez finds the place flooded and destroying the unit below.
episodes.title: Who Needs You

episodes.synopsis: Red invites Hyde to join him at the lodge, where all the members do is complain. Hyde worries how Red will take the news that he doesn't want to join.
episodes.title: Sweet Lady

episodes.synopsis: Mary Tyler Moore guest stars as local television show host Christine St. George.  Jackie ends up working as her new assistant.
episodes.title: Good Old Fashioned Lover Boy

episodes.synopsis: Hyde needs a Valentine's Day gift for Samantha. Randy plans a special Valentine's Day for Donna. Jackie has a tough time adjusting to her new boss.
episodes.title: Killer Queen

episodes.synopsis: Donna still misses Eric and struggles with her relationship with Randy. Fez gets Jackie a job sweeping up at the hair salon.
episodes.title: Spread Your Wings

episodes.synopsis: Hyde house-sits, and the gang decides to throw a party. Donna tells Kitty she still loves Eric. Kitty finally accepts that Donna is now with Randy.
episodes.title: Son and Daughter

episodes.synopsis: The gang is stranded overnight in the woods looking for Kitty's engagement ring from Red -- only to realize it was never really lost.
episodes.title: Keep Yourself Alive

episodes.synopsis: Jackie is upset that everyone is in a relationship and she's not. Hyde divorces Samantha, and Red sells the Muffler shop for a large sum of money.
episodes.title: My Fairy King

episodes.synopsis: Jackie reveals to Donna that she likes Fez. Red, retired and bored, starts helping out at the record store, driving Hyde and Randy crazy.
episodes.title: Crazy Little Thing Called Love

episodes.synopsis: Hyde organizes a bonfire to destroy disco records. Kitty has invited the new neighbors over and is surprised to discover that they are two men.
episodes.title: We Will Rock You

episodes.synopsis: Fez announces his love for Caroline, and Jackie announces her love for Fez. Hyde helps Red unload his heart medicine.
episodes.title: Sheer Heart Attack

episodes.synopsis: Bob plans to move to Florida and open a bait shop. Donna wants to stay in Point Place, but she doesn't want to be in a relationship with Randy.
episodes.title: Leaving Home Ain't Easy

episodes.synopsis: Hyde wigs out during a circle and decides to quit the stuff. When he starts acting healthy, his friends interfere. Kitty has a surprise announcement.
episodes.title: Love of My Life

episodes.synopsis: It's December 31, 1979, and Eric is flying back from Africa. Donna leaves college. Fez and Jackie are a couple. Hyde has a special surprise for Red.
episodes.title: That '70s Finale
